message: Let's split it evenly to start with!
Take a smaller share, I'll give you a chance to think
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I think I deserve more
You're getting desperate, take what you can get
I'll give you a larger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of
You're getting close to losing everything, don't be greedy
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going to get nothing
